predicate.note: Frames file for 'pine' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 32.2, Framenet entry Experiencer_subj.

roleset.name: long for, expire for lack of

example.name: the one example
example.text: A high-balance customer that banks pine for *trace*, she didn't give much thought to the rates she was receiving, nor to the fees she was paying.

roleset.name: long for, expire for lack of

example.name: phrasal variant
example.text: John pined away for love of Mary.
